availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: F. Marion Perry (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Perry and Elizabeth Perry. Married to Amanda Jane Tomlin Perry in Pendleton County on March 31, 1864. Farm worker in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 61.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272800, p. 241-242.
Find A Grave, "F. M. Perry (1838-1896)," Memorial #91870962 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/91870962 (accessed June 12, 2018).
